title: AutoRemote Push (Unofficial)
name: unofficial-autoremote-push
description: Pushes links and text to your Android device via AutoRemote using a toolbar button or the context menu. Not affiliated with JoÃ£o Dias (joaomgcd), author of AutoRemote.
author: Engyrus (Jerry Kindall)

preferences.name: api
preferences.title: AutoRemote API URL
preferences.description: In this browser, open the goo.gl URL displayed by the AutoRemote app on your Android device, then paste your personal AutoRemote URL here. (This is filled in automagically the first time you visit your personal AutoRemote page.)

preferences.name: textcmd
preferences.title: Command for Text Push
preferences.description: The AutoApps command that will be used for pushing text to your Android device. Use a Tasker profile to react to this command.

preferences.name: linkcmd
preferences.title: Command for Link Push
preferences.description: The AutoApps command that will be used for pushing links to your Android device. Use a Tasker profile to react to this command. Leave blank to have the link opened in your mobile browser as usual.

preferences.name: password
preferences.title: Password
preferences.description: The password set for AutoRemote on your device, if any. Not required for normal link pushing. When changing, delete and retype.

preferences.name: secure
preferences.title: Force Secure Pushes
preferences.description: Always use secure connection to push links to AutoRemote (rewrites API URL as https if necessary).

preferences.name: notify
preferences.title: Push Notifications
preferences.description: Confirm pushes with desktop notifications. (Errors are shown even if this is turned off.)
